name: Toy World War Commander Force
description:
Are you dreaming of counter-strike like shooter? Looking for a fast-paced shooter to play?

Then our new game – Toy World War Commander Force – could be just perfect for you!

Welcome to our toys world! The ultimate goal of the game is to win more rounds than the opposing team.

**HOW TO PLAY**
Use the arrow keys to control your character.
Tap the FIRE button to shoot at enemies.
Shoot only enemy of other team - team deathmatch mode!

Game features:
- fps shooter!
- blocky shooting game!
- traditional gameplay!
- cool gun shot sounds!
- cs like game style!
- hardcore team death match mode!

Enjoy yourself with Toy World War Commander Force!
Let's give them hell!
